languages.text: "Однако я все же считаю Дом Орселлио и лично вас, регент, виновным в случившемся".

traits.locale_text: "Однако я все же считаю Дом Орселлио и лично вас, регент, виновным в случившемся".

languages.text: "However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."
languages.original_text: "Однако я все же считаю Дом Орселлио и лично вас, регент, виновным в случившемся".

traits.locale_text: "However, I still consider House Orsellio and you, regent, personally responsible."
"However, I still consider House Orsellio and you, regent, personally responsible."
"However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."
"However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."
"However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."

languages.text: “不过，我依然认为奥赛罗家族与你，摄政王本人，对这件事情负有个人责任。”
languages.original_text: "However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我依然认为奥塞罗家族与你，摄政王本人，对这件事情负有个人责任。”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, la responsabilidad sigue recayendo sobre la casa Orsellio y, a título personal, sobre su regente».
languages.original_text: "However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, la responsabilidad sigue recayendo sobre la casa Orsellio y, a título personal, sobre su regente».

languages.text: 「だが、オーセリオ家の摂政であるお前には個人的な責任がある」
languages.original_text: "However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、オーセリオ家の摂政であるお前には個人的な責任がある」

languages.text: "Dennoch mach ich nach wie vor das Haus Orsellio und Euch, Regent, persönlich verantwortlich."
languages.original_text: "However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."

traits.locale_text: "Dennoch mach ich nach wie vor das Haus Orsellio und Euch, Regent, persönlich verantwortlich."

languages.text: « Cependant, je vous tiens toujours pour responsable de ce qu'il s'est passé, vous et la maison Orsellio. »
languages.original_text: "However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, je vous tiens toujours pour responsable de ce qu'il s'est passé, vous et la maison Orsellio. »

languages.text: "Hâlâ Orsellio Hanesi'ni ve seni kişisel olarak sorumlu tutuyorum ama Naip."
languages.original_text: "However, I still hold House Orsellio and you, Regent, personally responsible."

traits.locale_text: "Hâlâ Orsellio Hanesi'ni ve seni kişisel olarak sorumlu tutuyorum ama Naip."
